title: API Endpoint Performance Analysis
description: Analyze API endpoint performance and usage patterns
example_prompt: Analyze our API endpoints' performance metrics for the last month. Identify high-traffic endpoints, response times, error rates, and usage patterns. Suggest optimization opportunities.

environmentVariables.name: config_path
environmentVariables.description: Path to the routing configuration file (e.g., routes.rb, urls.py, routes.js)

environmentVariables.name: framework
environmentVariables.description: The web framework being used (e.g., Rails, Django, Express)
